name: Blunt Head
description:
Blunt Head is an objective based side-scroller melee action game. You play as an undercover police tracking down criminal organization using the only way they can understand...VIOLENCE!

The game features advanced melee mechanic featuring both offensive and defensive play. Player can attack repeatably and perform parry to stun the enemy by timing block carefully and finish them with a powerful execution move.

Player has to follow the objective given to them to complete the level, from defending the computer while your friend is hacking to fighting a criminal boss on drug.

This is my university project and the game features only 2 levels under the scope of the game. Further development is not planned yet, but I hope you enjoy the game! :D

DISCLAIMER: I do not own all the assets used in this game. The assets used in this game belongs to its creator or owner.
